Question: After four seasons, this person was canceled.
Hints: Upshaw later told this person that her daughter, Autumn Jackson, was his daughter, too, but he denied it.
Twenty-two-year-old Autumn Jackson was sentenced to 26 months in jail for trying to extort $40 million from this person.
Dyson suggested this person's comments "betray classist, elitist viewpoints rooted in generational warfare.".
